| Overview                = The Charniputra are gargoyle-like [[Vampires]]. Charniputra mostly fly above the [[Himalayas]] with their great wings, spending almost all non-feeding time in the sky. Charniputra also have a tough hide that's hard to damage without the weaknesses. They attend the Vampire gathering once a century.{{r|Tomb of Dracula Vol 4 3}}
